As a user I have the possibility to choose a dish from the list for further update.

Acceptance criteria

  • Possibility to choose the dish by pressing on its name.
  • Availability to get all the fields of the dish in input forms.

As a user, I can see counter only on selected dish cards

Acceptance criteria

  • Click on the dish card toggles the select state of the card
  • Counter is shown on selected cards only
  • Counter should be set to 1 in case user selects the dish card
  • Counter should be set to 0 in case user deselects the dish card

as a user i want to have the ability to confirm or decline deleting of item using the prompt

Acceptance criteria

  • button delete removes dish item from list
  • button cancel closes prompt without any changes to list

as a user i want to see confirmation prompt when i click on delete button on any item of dish list on foodlord page

  • pressing the delete button shows prompt with question Are you sure you want to delete item?: and two buttons: delete and cancel
  • prompt and all buttons style and positioning is up to UI mockup

As a User, I want to see a checkbox on a card of every dish and to be able to check/uncheck these checkboxes.

Acceptance criteria

  • Every card with a dish has a counter
  • Counter allows to increase/decrease the number in it
  • Counter is displayed as on a mockup

As a user, I can add a new dish using the dish creation form, so that the new dish will be displayed in the dishes list.

Acceptance criteria

  • Created dish is displayed in the dishes list
  • The new dish is still in the dishes list after page refreshment.

As a user, I can see the error message in case of incorrect input.

Acceptance criteria

  • The error message is displayed if
    • name is empty or longer than 50 characters.
    • price is empty or it isn`t numeric with two digits after coma
    • description is longer than 500 characters.
  • The error message is as shown on the mockup.

As a user I should be notified that an error occured.

Acceptance criteria

  • The notification should be thrown in any moment of time during the process of updating.
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"admin"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"noliynyk"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"admin"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1561552655596"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"LR-27","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Ideal days","value":["2"],"valueId":["2"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"Desktop.png","id":"7-22","url":"https://intelliarts.com:8444/_persistent/Desktop.png?file=7-22&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"foodLord","cssClass":"c6"}]}, {"id":"LR-20","entityId":"2-45","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Updating a dish"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nazar Oliynyk"},{"name":"created","value":"1561122987924"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"20"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a user I should be able to update all the fields of the dish with ensuing validation.

  • Possibility to get input form of all the fields of the dish.
  • Validating all the fields after update according to the rules applied for creating the meal
  • Appearance of done updates in the card of the dish

As a user i can see a button 'delete' when i select at least one item of dish in list using checkboxes beside them

Acceptance criteria

  • selection of any count of items in list causes appearance of delete button
  • button style and positioning is up to UI mockup
